t: Sell on Amazon Handmade | Apply now to join our maker-only community of sellers
s: Amazon uses an application process to add new makers to the Handmade category to ensure customers are able to buy with confidence. How do your fees work? Joining Handmade, creating your shop, and listing products is free. When you make a sale, Handmade will deduct a 15% referral fee.
